string.text: Esmarch

%c[pda_white]Esmarch%c[ui_gray_1] is a former army medic on Cordon. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
If you believe the stories of others, Esmarch passed Afghanistan and a few more conflicts, but with him this topic is better not to raise.
Joint

%c[pda_white]Joint%c[ui_gray_1] is a local doctor stationed at the Garbage Depot.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
Joint's brother. He is a small-time huckster who came to the Zone for easy money. Nevertheless, he's a much better doctor than a merchant.
Joint

%c[pda_white]Joint%c[ui_gray_1] is a technician who sits at the Garbage Depot. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
Joint's brother. Mechanic, knows by heart every bolt in every bucket on wheels in the Zone. He also knows his way around a gun.
Vet

%c[pda_white]Vet%c[ui_gray_1] a young doctor in Darkscape.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
A very young guy, yesterday's graduate, who by some miracle is still in good health. However, he knows how to heal.
Vityok Quack

%c[pda_white]Quack%c[ui_gray_1] is a doctor at the bandit base, the Truck Cemetery. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
A doctor is worth his weight in gold, especially in the middle of a radioactive field, so Vityok had a good job. Outside the Zone, he was not known for his law-abiding behavior either.
Smack

%c[pda_white]Smack%c[ui_gray_1] is a field medic on Yantar, hired by the scientists. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
An dishonest merc. He has access to a warehouse of drugs, which he uses to enrich himself. His prices aren't bad.
Waksman

%c[pda_white]Waksman%c[ui_gray_1] is a professor of medicine who arrived in a bunker in the vicinity of the "Jupiter" plant.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
Professor of medicine. Bad temper, sharp tongue. He treats perfectly, but it's better not to approach him unnecessarily, otherwise Waksman gets nervous.
Acid

%c[pda_white]Acid%c[ui_gray_1] is a bandit medic in the vicinity of the "Jupiter" plant. 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
A former lab assistant at the university, now a gangster and drug addict. His brains have long ago rotted away, but his hands are still golden, and no one can find better drugs.
Corpsman

%c[pda_white]%cCorpsman[ui_gray_1] is a medic at the mercs' facility in zaton 
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
 A merc who can't live without war. Old enough to be a soldier, but just right for a field healer.
Pharmacist

%c[pda_white]%cPharmacist[ui_gray_1] is a doctor, a member of the Gryphon squad in East Pripyat.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
A failed drug lord who escaped to the Zone to save his skin from prison. Where there's no law, the Pharmacist is happy. 
%c[pda_yellow]Trivia%c[ui_gray_1]
 
â€¢ Thanks to his connections, he can get all kinds of medicines in large quantities and at a good price.
Rhesus

%c[pda_white]%cRhesus[ui_gray_1] is a doctor on the base of singles, laundry, East of Pripyat.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
A real mystery. Some people don't even believe he exists. But nevertheless, Rhesus exists, and he has golden hands and a kind heart. Rumor has it that he once slaughtered a pack of soldiers with just one knife. Rezus himself guffaws.
